DOC.brief_summary: To compare the safety and IOP-lowering efficacy of TRAVATAN and XALCOM in subjects with open-angle glaucoma or ocular hypertension.
DOC.brief_title: A 6-Week Safety and Efficacy Study of Travatan Compared to Xalcom in Subjects With Open-Angle Glaucoma(OAG) or Ocular Hypertension(OHT)
DOC.criteria: Patients of any race and either sex with openangle glaucoma (with or without pigment dispersion or pseudoexfoliation component) or ocular hypertension.
